text: Ta shuo:â€œWo de zongzu a! Nimen gaosu wo ba, ruguo wo shi yiju cong wo de zhu jiang shi de mingzheng de, bingqie ta ceng jiang cong ta fachu de jiamei de jiyang shangci wo,(nandao wo ken weibei ta de mingling ma?) Wo bu yuan he nimen beidao'erchi, wo jinzhi nimen fanzui, wo jiu bu fanzui, wo zhi yuan jin wo suo neng congshi gaige gongzuo, wo de chenggong quan lai zhenzhu de yuanzhu, wo zhi xinlai ta, wo zhi guiyi ta
